name: Sole Shot
description:
What happens when you try to make a shooter with only one ammo? You get a puzzle game!

Try to kill all the enemies in the room using only one shot.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. Given the theme of "only one", you are only given one shot to clear the whole level, and, aside from the text, every art asset in the game makes use of a single 4x4 png of plain white, like the top hat below!

Background music: 8 Bit Chillout! by HeatleyBros

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8El8ZP8LMFE
